original_text: Do not leave the entrance to the tent of meeting for seven days, until the days of your ordination are completed, for your ordination will last seven days.
korean_text: 위임식은 이레 동안 행하나니 위임식이 끝나는 날까지 이레 동안은 회막 문에 나가지 말라

sentences.original_text: Do not leave the entrance to the tent of meeting
until the days of your ordination are completed
for your ordination will last seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 네 위임은 이레 동안 계속될 것이기 때문이다
